publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1138 Donald Gorrie: The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre-That the Parliament hopes that the name "Kenny Macintyre Media Centre" as the title of the Parliament's current media centre will continue to be used in the new parliament building.

S2M-1138 Donald Gorrie: The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre-That the Parliament hopes that the name "Kenny Macintyre Media Centre" as the title of the Parliament's current media centre will continue to be used in the new parliament building. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson*, Jackie Baillie*, Kate Maclean*, George Lyon*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mike Rumbles*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-1138 The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre (lodged on 31 March 2004) Robin Harper*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-1138 The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre (lodged on 31 March 2004) Karen Gillon*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-1138 The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre (lodged on 31 March 2004) Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1138 The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre (lodged on 31 March 2004) Murdo Fraser*, Dr Jean Turner*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-1138 The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre (lodged on 31 March 2004) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-1138 The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre (lodged on 31 March 2004) John Scott*
S2M-1138 The Kenny Macintyre Media Centre (lodged on 31 March 2004) Phil Gallie*, Elaine Smith*
